overview.title: Back to perfection
overview.text: Huawei Ascend P6S — is the development of the successful model Huawei Ascend P6— the thinnest smartphone in the world (2013). Ascend P6S supplements its previous model with 2 SIM cards, new 1,6 GHz processor, expanded volume of internal memory up to 16 GB, updated version of Android 4.4 and Emotion UI 2.3 interface.

overview.title: 2 SIM cards
overview.text: The support of 2 SIM cards became an important addition in Ascend P6S, which makes it more convenient in case of using 2 mobile numbers at the same time: during the trip, in case of working and personal phones' combination e.t.c. The smartphone is equipped with 2 active radio modules, therefore both SIM cards are always active. You can receive calls on both cards at the same time, and internet connection via one of the cards will not be interrupted during the conversation by the other one.

overview.title: Automatic object recognition
overview.text: In the automatic object recognition mode the phone automatically adjusts contrast, color and lighting, depending on the shooting location: cloudy, backlight, sunny, indoors, etc.

overview.title: AirSharing function
overview.text: Instant sharing of photos, music, video files and many other things between multiple devices, including your friend's phone and TV set-top box with MediaQ.

specification.title: Display
text: Size : 4.7 inch IPS+ LCD capacitive touchscreen

specification.title: Camera
text: Camera resolution : 3264 x 2448 pixels, autofocus, LED flash

specification.title: Audio
text: Audio encoding: MP3, WMA 2–9, AMR-NB, AMR-WB, AAC, AAC+, eAAC+, MIDI
Audio file formats: MP3, MP4, 3GP, WMA, OGG, AMR, AAC, FLAC, WAV, MIDI

specification.title: Video
text: Video encoding: MPEG-4, H.264, H.263, Real Video 7–10, WMV 9, XVID, AC3
Video file formats: 3GP, MP4, WMV, RM, RMVB
